biotools.summary: EpiMut is software for functional annotation of amino acid substitutions (AASs) in epigenetic factors that is independent from sequence alignments and homology search. It is based on the biochemical and physicochemical characteristics of amino acids and digital signal processing approach in protein sequence analysis.
